story.title: Grandma's New Phone
story.description: Your friend Sam is trying to teach their Grandma how to use a smartphone. You're their emotional support.

s4_m2.text: I've made a terrible, terrible mistake.

s4_m3.text: It's 10 AM on a Saturday. What did you do? Adopt another cat?

s4_m4.text: Worse. I bought Grandma a smartphone.

s4_m5.text: I'm trying to teach her how to video chat.

s4_m6.text: Oh no. Sam. Why would you do that to yourself?

s4_m7.text: She said she wanted to 'see the grandkids'!

s4_m8.text: She's trying to answer my video call now. Hold on.

s4_m10.text: Okay, she picked up. But I think she's holding the phone upside down.

s4_m11.text: All I can see is the ceiling fan.

s4_m12.text: (muffled) SAM? SAMMY? CAN YOU HEAR ME?

s4_m13.text: GRANDMA, I CAN HEAR YOU! FLIP THE PHONE!

s4_m15.text: OKAY, now it's just a blurry shot of her chin.

s4_m16.text: (muffled) IT'S NOT WORKING, SAMMY. I'M PRESSING THE BUTTON.

s4_m18.text: Sam has sent you an image.

s4_m19.text: This is my view. I think this is her left nostril.

s4_m20.text: HAHAHA. This is art. Frame it.

s4_m21.text: Don't laugh. She hung up. She's trying to text me now.

s4_m23.text: Sammy dear i made you a pie

s4_m25.text: how do i send it on the line

s4_m26.text: Grandma, you can't send a pie over text.

s4_m27.text: Nonsense. Your aunt Susan sends me pictures of her cat.

s4_m28.text: Hold on. I'll use the picture button.

s4_m33.text: Yes. He is a handsome boy.

s4_m34.text: You were supposed to send the PIE.

s4_m35.text: Oh. I ate the pie. It was good.

s4_m36.text: I'm dying. This is the best.

s4_m37.text: I give up. I'm just glad she can text. I'm telling her to put it away.

s4_m38.text: Grandma, great job. Let's take a break.

s4_m39.text: OKAY DEAR. I AM GOING TO THE FACE-BOOK.

s4_m40.text: Wait... how did you get on Facebook?

s4_m41.text: Sam has sent you an image.

s4_m42.text: She sent me this. She found the 'large text' setting.

s4_m43.text: The entire phone is just one word at a time.

s4_m44.text: She's too powerful. You've created a monster.

s4_m45.text: She just posted 'CORN' on my wall. Just 'CORN'.

s4_m46.text: I'm going back to bed. This was a bad idea.

options.text: Tell Sam to buy her an iPad.

s4_m48a.text: Want me to come over? We can tag-team this.

s4_m49a.text: YES. PLEASE. Bring coffee. And maybe a helmet.

s4_m48b.text: You know... an iPad is just a really big phone...

s4_m49b.text: Don't you DARE put that idea into the universe.

s4_m50b.text: She'll be texting with her elbows. I can't.
